   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to The Automated Temperature Detection and Attendance Regiser System's documentation!
==============================================================================================

This is the documentation page of the system that was developed for the EEE4022S research project.
It provides all the necessary documentation that one would need to replicate the system as created by Author Mukwevho Zwanga
Under the Supervision of Jarryd Son.

Direct any queries to Zwanga at: zwangatm3@gmail.com

==================

* :ref:`search`
